items.title: 2016 Jezebel PN
items.description: Light fruity wine with hints of freshly-cut grass.

items.title: 2014 Sand & Stone
items.description: Intense wine with a deep aftertaste, reminiscent of a carefree holiday.

items.description: Fortified wine, perfect for pairing with desserts.

items.title: 2016 Texas High Plains White
items.description: A fresh and light wine, great for enjoying a Texas sunset.

items.title: 2017 Euphoria
items.description: Delight in one glass! Light and aromatic wine with a deep aftertaste.

items.title: 2019 Texas Chenin Blanc
items.description: A versatile white wine that pleases all our guests.

items.title: 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon
items.description: Rich and robust with intense flavors of dark fruit, black pepper, and oak.

items.title: 2013 Wild Card Red
items.description: Bold and velvety, boasting aromas of ripe cherries, plums, and vanilla.

items.title: 2015 Ultimate Pinot Noir
items.description: Medium-bodied with notes of blackberry, cedar, and spice.

items.title: 2015 Texas High Plains Red
items.description: Lively and elegant with flavors of ripe currants, tobacco, and chocolate.

items.title: 2013 The Aussie Red
items.description: Rich and powerful, with aromas of black currants, figs, and herbs.

items.title: 2014 Grenache Syrah
items.description: Deep and earthy, with hints of blackberry, oak, and licorice.

items.title: 2018 Texas High Plains Rose
items.description: Aromatic and floral with a splash of fruity sweetness.

items.title: 2017 Chef Rudy Rose
items.description: Soft and supple, with notes of strawberries and cream.

items.title: 2015 Vitiano Rosato
items.description: Balanced and smooth, with delicate aromas of ripe raspberries.

items.title: 2012 Winters's Hill Estate Dry Rose
items.description: A light and refreshing rose with hints of citrus and peach.

items.title: 2014 Wolffer Estate Rose
items.description: Rich and dry, with a bouquet of ripe strawberry and cranberry.

items.title: 2015 Ehlers Estate Sylviane Rose
items.description: Crisp and fruity, with a hint of watermelon and wildflowers.

items.description: Treat yourself to a fruity sip of bubbly with this delightful sparkling brut.

items.description: A light and crisp blend of white grapes, perfect for a summer picnic.

items.description: A sweet and fruity blend of rosé grapes, perfect for a night out.

items.description: A robust and flavorful Argentinian red, perfect for a night in.

items.description: Refreshing and bubbly, perfect for any celebration.
